r.d:
With this package you can monitor running processes based upon an XML configuration file, XML string, INI file or an array where you define patterns, conditions and actions.
Console::Getopt and XML::DTD must be installed if you want to use the shipped shell scripts 'procwatch' and 'procwatch-lint'.
r.n: * Shell script procwatch-lint was verbose by default. * Fixed all '--' in the comment header of procwatch-1_0.dtd, which are not allowed. * Added WinNT batch scripts (A *very* simple ps fake for WinNT is available at: http://dev.iworks.at/ps/ps.zip [18k]).
